thread.title: James Taylor
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by James Taylor

author: James Taylor
title: James Taylor
text: Free delivery via Royal Mail. Prepaid return label included should the item purchased not suit. 48 hour delivery and return. Quick refund for unsuitable item. Very pleased with the service provided by Country Attire. Unfortunately, the Barbour jacket purchased didn't fit as expected but the entire transaction and refund were exemplary. Will definitely bookmark the site for the future.
